title: Studios are here and ready for rent!
posting_body: Contact our leasing office today to set up a tour appointment with one of our friendly team members!
Join the Domicilio Apartments Community today!
Live in a spacious home in the wonderful city of Santa Clara, minutes away from downtown!
Find yourself cutting your commute in half as you’re conveniently located super close to the main highways and several public transportation options!
Make one of our spacious homes your new personal paradise within the Domicilio Community!
Be sure to visit your new community:
Our amazing community has all the amenities you could wish for:

Spa/Hot Tub • Resort-Inspired Pool • Fitness Center • Guest Suites Available • Controlled-Access Community • Elevators • Bike Racks • Additional Storage on Balcony • Additional parking Available • Electric Vehicle EV Charging Stations •
Professional On-site Management • Underground parking Available •

• Complete Stainless Appliance package • Breathtaking Views and Natural Light • Designer Spray Head Faucets • Designer Track Lighting in Dining Areas • Expansive Windows with Breathtaking • Full-size Washers and Dryers • Gourmet Kitchens with Granite Countertops • Large Kitchen Pantries • Luxury Baths with Cultured Marble • Master Baths with Double-sinks • Personal Balconies or Patios • Pre-wired for Alarm Systems • Sleek Wood Cabinets •
Stainless Steel Sinks • Surrounds and Countertops • Vaulted Ceilings on Top Floor • Wood-style Flooring in Kitchens and Entries
Due to COVID-19 restrictions imposed by local and state health orders, certain amenities may not be available or their availability may be limited in order to comply with the health orders.
Pets - Max 2 allowed Comments: Please call our leasing office for complete pet policy information.
Cats - allowed Dogs - allowed We Love Pets!
